result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David S Golden

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
10:08 AM Defendant David S Golden appeared by video.  Attorney Brian William Severson appeared by video for David S Golden.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court.  Attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for State of Wisconsin. Golden and Severson has complaint, requests PH and will waive time limits for it. Court continues bond, considers time limits waived, defendants need to appear in person, unless waived and have that information filed prior to the PH date, sets for PH on 11/30/22 at 11:30 AM.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on November 16, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 001462,
Payable Number: 49705,
Receipt Number: 22R 002701,
Amount: $20.00

9:32 AM Defendant David S Golden appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant has not received a copy of the criminal complaint. Court reads charges and penalties. Defendant understands. Court questions if they have contacted an attorney. Defendant has but has not gotten much information from them. Court advises of options for obtaining an attorney; private hire, SPD or court appointed if not eligible for SPD. Defendant understands and wife indicates they have contacted Attorney Jeff Joy, just waiting to hear back from attorney. Court will have set for AIA to allow Golden to obtain counsel. Court will have set for AIA and continues bond. Court explains future court appearances will have to be in person unless attorney files the appropriate request and order. Golden understands.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 19, 2022 at 10:15 am.
